languages.text: {n}Что-то в тоне вашего голоса заставляет Маражая замереть — а затем приблизиться к вам и склониться к самому лицу. Взгляд черных глаз жадно впивается в вас, ловя малейшее движение, а голос падает до издевательского шепота.{/n} "Что же... я слушаю, мон-кай".

{n}Something about the tone of your voice makes Marazhai freeze — and then come closer and lean almost into your face. His black eyes greedily devour your slightest movement and his voice drops to a mocking whisper:{/n} "Very well... I am listening, mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то в тоне вашего голоса заставляет Маражая замереть — а затем приблизиться к вам и склониться к самому лицу. Взгляд черных глаз жадно впивается в вас, ловя малейшее движение, а голос падает до издевательского шепота.{/n} "Что же... я слушаю, мон-кай".

traits.locale_text: {n}Something about the tone of your voice makes Marazhai freeze — and then come closer and lean almost into your face. The gaze of the black eyes greedily captures the slightest movement, and the voice drops to a mocking whisper.{/n} "Very well... I am listening, mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Quelque chose dans le ton de votre voix fait que Marazhai se fige, puis s'approche à quelques centimètres de votre visage. Ses yeux noirs captent avidement le moindre de vos mouvements, et sa voix se mue en un murmure arrogant.{/n} « Très bien... Je vous écoute, mon-keigh. »
languages.original_text: {n}Something about the tone of your voice makes Marazhai freeze — and then come closer and lean almost into your face. His black eyes greedily devour your slightest movement and his voice drops to a mocking whisper:{/n} "Very well... I am listening, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque chose dans le ton de votre voix fait que Marazhai se fige, puis s'approche à quelques centimètres de votre visage. Ses yeux noirs captent avidement le moindre de vos mouvements, et sa voix se mue en un murmure arrogant.{/n} « Très bien... Je vous écoute, mon-keigh. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}你的语气让玛拉斋愣了一下。他凑了过来，几乎要凑到你的脸上。他黑洞洞的眼睛贪婪地注视着你最轻微的动作，声音变得如同嘲弄的耳语一般。{/n}“很好……说吧，猴子。”
languages.original_text: {n}Something about the tone of your voice makes Marazhai freeze — and then come closer and lean almost into your face. His black eyes greedily devour your slightest movement and his voice drops to a mocking whisper:{/n} "Very well... I am listening, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}你的语气让玛拉斋愣了一下。他凑了过来，几乎要凑到你的脸上。他黑洞洞的眼睛贪婪地注视着你最轻微的动作，声音变得如同嘲弄的耳语一般。{/n}“很好……说吧，猴子。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}その声のトーンに、なぜかマラズハイは表情をこわばらせ、近づいてきて、あなたの顔に寄りかかった。彼の黒い瞳はあなたのわずかな動きにも貪欲に食らいつき、声は嘲笑うようなささやきへと変わる。{/n}「いいだろう。聞いてやるぞ、モン＝ケイ」
languages.original_text: {n}Something about the tone of your voice makes Marazhai freeze — and then come closer and lean almost into your face. His black eyes greedily devour your slightest movement and his voice drops to a mocking whisper:{/n} "Very well... I am listening, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}その声のトーンに、なぜかマラズハイは表情をこわばらせ、近づいてきて、あなたの顔に寄りかかった。彼の黒い瞳はあなたのわずかな動きにも貪欲に食らいつき、声は嘲笑うようなささやきへと変わる。{/n}「いいだろう。聞いてやるぞ、モン＝ケイ」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Irgendwas am Ton deiner Stimme lässt Marazhai erstarren – dann nähert er sich dir, bis sein Gesicht fast das deine berührt. Der Blick seiner schwarzen Augen verschlingt gierig jede noch so kleine Bewegung, und seine Stimme senkt sich zu einem hochnäsigen Flüstern.{/n} "Also gut ... Ich höre zu, Chem-Pan-Sey."
languages.original_text: {n}Something about the tone of your voice makes Marazhai freeze — and then come closer and lean almost into your face. His black eyes greedily devour your slightest movement and his voice drops to a mocking whisper:{/n} "Very well... I am listening, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendwas am Ton deiner Stimme lässt Marazhai erstarren – dann nähert er sich dir und lehnt sich fast gegen dein Gesicht. Der Blick seiner schwarzen Augen fängt gierig jede noch so kleine Bewegung ein und seine Stimme senkt sich zu einem hochnäsigen Flüstern.{/n} "Also gut ... Ich höre zu, Chem-Pan-Sey."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Hay algo en el tono de tu voz que capta el interés de Marazhai; se acerca a ti y se inclina hasta quedar a escasos centímetros de tu rostro. Sus ojos negros capturan con avidez tus más tenues movimientos, y baja la voz hasta convertirla en un susurro burlón.{/n} «Muy bien... estoy escuchando, mon-keigh».
languages.original_text: {n}Something about the tone of your voice makes Marazhai freeze — and then come closer and lean almost into your face. His black eyes greedily devour your slightest movement and his voice drops to a mocking whisper:{/n} "Very well... I am listening, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hay algo en el tono de tu voz que capta el interés de Marazhai; se acerca a ti y se inclina hasta quedar a escasos centímetros de tu rostro. La mirada de sus ojos negros captura con avidez tus más tenues movimientos, y baja la voz hasta convertirla en un susurro burlón.{/n} «Muy bien... estoy escuchando, mon-keigh».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai

languages.text: {n}Ses tonundaki bir şey, Marazhai'ın donup kalmasına sebep oluyor. Sonrasında sana yaklaşıp yüzüne eğiliyor. Siyah gözleri en ufak hareketini bile takip ediyor, sesi alçalarak alaycı bir fısıltıya dönüşüyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Dinliyorum mon-keigh."
languages.original_text: {n}Something about the tone of your voice makes Marazhai freeze — and then come closer and lean almost into your face. His black eyes greedily devour your slightest movement and his voice drops to a mocking whisper:{/n} "Very well... I am listening, mon-keigh."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses tonundaki bir şeyler Marazhai'ın donup kalmasına sebep oluyor, ardından sana doğru yaklaşıyor ve yüzüne eğiliyor. Siyah gözleri en ufak hareketini bile takip ediyor ve sesi alçalarak alaycı bir fısıltıya dönüşüyor:{/n} "Pekâlâ. Dinliyorum mon-keigh."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Marazhai
